#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int fact(long long unsigned n)
{
    if(n<=2)
        return n;
    else 
        return n*fact(n-1);
}
int main()
{
    long long int t;
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        long long unsigned n,k;
        scanf("%llu",&n);
        k=fact(n);
        printf("%llu\n",k);
    }
    return 0;
}
